item.title: 400-Year-Old Key Drill Bit
item.description: Examining a 400-year-old key drill bit, highlighting its design, historical use, and craftsmanship in early metalworking and toolmaking.

item.title: This Is Worth a Try
item.description: Showcasing a fun, unique, or tasty idea that’s worth trying, highlighting the process, results, and why it’s an enjoyable or useful experience.
